entity.name: copyright
entity.query:
SELECT r.id resourceID, regexp_replace(r.filepath, '\d+/\d+/', '') filename, r.mimetype mimeType, r.fulltexturl url, r.copyrightreviewstatus reviewStatus, rc.id collectionID, rc.rcnumberid collectionNumber, rc.title collectionTitle, e.id entryID, e.modified modified, rcl.name locationname, rcl.id locationid
FROM resource r LEFT JOIN journal_article ja ON r.id = ja.resourceid LEFT JOIN book_chapter bc ON r.id = bc.resourceid LEFT JOIN file f ON r.id = f.resourceid LEFT JOIN entry e ON ja.id = e.id OR bc.id = e.id OR f.id = e.id LEFT JOIN reserve_collection rc ON e.reservecollectionid = rc.id LEFT JOIN library_location rcl ON rc.librarylocationid = rcl.id WHERE r.fulltexturl IS NULL AND e.deleted IS NULL AND r.filepath IS NOT NULL AND r.filedeleted IS NULL
